alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 02 at 2:03AM PDT until April 03 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 5 PM Sunday to 6 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility over Secret Pass on State Route 229.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
